title: Was ‘Capitol Invasion’ Lego Set Released Months Ahead of DC Riot?
subtitle: The purported set included a Lego likeness of a man dressed in horns and furs.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A “Capitol Invasion” Lego set that showed several well-publicized members of the Jan. 6, 2021, pro-Trump mob was released months ahead of the riots in the District of Columbia.
